content: (I have not tried the latest beta) I'm not convinced there is really a reason for the project. It's very well put-together. It's got a beautiful and consistent interface. (I use the same theme and icons on arch) but there are issues. It takes forever to boot, it's unnecessarily restrictive, and it's not more user friendly than Linux Mint, Ubuntu MATE, or Manjaro. It's okay, but I wouldn't recommend it to new users over the other three distros I mentioned.
